activities: CAC Group Inc. acts as a processor on behalf of its clients, providing customized services that enable organizations to manage their customer information efficiently in such ways as reducing data-processing timeframes, increasing marketing efficiency, and applying database marketing strategies. CAC Group processes marketing information of its clients and on behalf of its clients.
